name: Can't Shut App
description: A messaging app that let's users create chat rooms and chat with people all around world.

name: Chef's Choice
description: Had the chance to work with other engineers and collaborate with UX designers to build a cooking app that features chefs and their unique recipes.

name: My Buddy List
description: A great way to send friend requests, keep track of your pals, and receive live user updates using websockets.

name: Time Trial Trivia
description: A fun trivia game that prompts the player to click moving objects while trying to answer game questions.
